greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k>=0} 1/(6*k)!.
comment: For q integer >= 1, Sum_{m>=0} 1/(q*m)! = (1/q) * Sum_{k=1..q} exp(X_k) where X_1, X_2, ..., X_q are the q-th roots of unity.
reference: Serge Francinou, Hervé Gianella, Serge Nicolas, Exercices de Mathématiques, Oraux X-ENS, Analyse 2, problème 3.10 p.182, Cassini, Paris, 2004
results.author: _Bernard Schott_, Mar 02 2020
